concept.title: Tableau Desktop and Web Authoring Release Notes
concept.shortdesc: Applies to: Tableau Cloud, Tableau Desktop, Tableau Server

conbody.p: This topic describes whatâ€™s new in the latest release. Use the viz below to explore new features in Tableau Desktop and web authoring. Click a feature name to display a tooltip with a link to documentation for that feature. Apply filters to refine your search.

ul.li: Click Search by Feature to see a list of new features for a product or version, or to explore when a feature was released. The dashboard currently defaults to Desktop (which includes web authoring features) and the latest released version of Tableau Desktop.
Click Upgrade Desktop to see a list of all features specific to Tableau Desktop and web authoring.

conbody.note: Click the Download button in the viz toolbar (while no feature names are selected), and then select Data to export the list to a CSV file that you can customize.
